body: Right, but not by default, which I guess was what brought me here googling. In a golang support chat, someone told me to wait until v1.6.1 or I might have to change the code again. Is that true, or will modifying the Transport work even after v1.6.1 is out? And if so, do you have some example code that would be forward compatible (since we don't know what changes are planned)? Thanks much! :)
